body_html:
According to the post said, there are different sets of gradients, because the updates are performed at the same time @ispirmustafa . I don't know if my understanding is correct. The issue here looks the same as that post.

Thank you for your kind reply.

body:
According to the [post](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49953379/tensorflow-multiple-loss-functions-vs-multiple-training-ops) said, there are different sets of gradients, because the updates are performed at the same time @ispirmustafa . I don't know if my understanding is correct. The issue here looks the same as that post.

Thank you for your kind reply.
